data.name: 69 Ways to Kill a Zombie
data.detailed_description:
Adventure and romance! Wishlist an follow!


https://store.steampowered.com/app/687800/Heads_Will_Roll_Reforged/


Play for free!


https://store.steampowered.com/app/385530/Astro_Lords/


About the Game

1st zombie shooter EVER where you must physically move your hands in a natural walking motion to run in the game!!

  • Get creative with killing, using various weapons, explosives, traps and tools hidden all over the dark and twisted environments.

  • Pickup random power-ups in order to survive just a little longer!

  • There is no animations, everything is physics-based movement and interaction.

  • 3 atmospheric maps with pure horror sound effects. ( Several NEW maps coming soon )

  • 60+ weapons with unique handling and special effects

data.short_description: Experience the innovative "LOCO" motion VR movement system to grind through hordes of physics-based zombies! Weapons? We give you over 60 tools to unleash Your creativity - guns, explosives, traps, swords, bows, spears! A true first peek into the future of VR movement.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: NA
